com.timtim3001.bettercalendarview

Class BetterCalendarView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.LinearLayout
          • com.timtim3001.bettercalendarview.BetterCalendarView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent

    public class BetterCalendarView
extends android.widget.LinearLayout
    This class is a calendar widget that supports events. You can use it for selecting and displaying dates and making and display calendar events

    The calendar can be customized and follows the material design guidelines. You can select a date by tapping on it and can scroll either by using the buttons on the top or swipe left and right.
